coreAttributes.name: skirt
coreAttributes.description: An ordinary skirt, made out of soft fabric and sporting an elasticated waistband. It reaches down to just above the wearer's knees.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(step)] into the skirt and [npc.verb(pull)] it up to fit around [npc.her] waist.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(get)] [npc2.name] to step into the skirt, before pulling it up around [npc2.her] waist.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.name] to step into the skirt, before yanking it up around [npc2.her] waist.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc.her] skirt, before slipping it off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc2.namePos] skirt, before slipping it off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc2.namePos] skirt, before yanking it off.
